RelatedSentence: The world 's favorite toy turns four decades today and Google is paying homage with a cool new animation on its homepage .
The Rubik 's Cube was invented on May 19 , 1974 by Hungarian architect and professor Ern≈ë Rubik originally as a mobile sculpture to help demonstrate spatial relationships to his students .

RelatedSentence: The original cube was made of plastic , with each face having a different color : red , yellow , orange , green , blue and white .
Today , Google has a digital version of the Rubik 's Cube which , is of course , interactive .
You can twist the rows horizontally and vertically by dragging the tiles .
You can also rotate the entire cube in different directions by clicking outside the cube .
It even shows a number at the bottom left of the cube to tell you how many moves you 've made .

RelatedSentence: Each of the cube 's six faces is made of nine separate squares with stickers indicating its color .
Each row or column attaches to the center of the cube through an internal pivot , which means you can move the small cubes around and mix up the colors .
